
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(contrib-libs-libcpuid)
target_compile_options(contrib-libs-libcpuid PRIVATE
  -DHAVE_CONFIG_H
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(contrib-libs-libcpuid PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libcpuid
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libcpuid/internal
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libcpuid/libcpuid
)
target_link_libraries(contrib-libs-libcpuid PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
)
target_sources(contrib-libs-libcpuid PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libcpuid/libcpuid/asm-bits.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libcpuid/libcpuid/cpuid_main.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libcpuid/libcpuid/libcpuid_util.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libcpuid/libcpuid/rdmsr.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libcpuid/libcpuid/rdtsc.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libcpuid/libcpuid/recog_amd.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/libcpuid/libcpuid/recog_intel.c
)
